ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1]
This mod adds a number of magical furnitures that radiates light into their surroundings.
These furnitures are safe to place under the rain and are quite beautiful to look at. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a small explosion.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]1 Lamp (General lighting) [*]2 Pedestals (Plant growing/General lighting) [*]1 Research [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*]Will not play nice with other gemstone mods without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Gems are intentionally sparse and not easy to obtain through natural means, but they can also be purchased from traders or obtained from salvaging certain objects.
Balance feedbacks are welcomed, please provide context when doing so.
